name: ListGithubReleaseAssets
description:
Retrieve a list of assets for a GitHub release.

This tool fetches and returns a list of assets associated with a specific release in a GitHub repository. It should be called when you need to access the files or resources attached to a particular release of a GitHub project.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the GitHub repository. This is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: release_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the GitHub release to fetch assets from.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the release.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to display per page, with a maximum value of 100. This controls pagination.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: The specific page number to fetch from the list of release assets. Useful for navigation in paginated results.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: release_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the release.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the release.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
